review_data.title: Gluten Free Pizza When You Need It

review_data.title: Absolut ungeniessbar

review_data.title: DONT ORDER HERE!
review_data.content: Extremely BAD service, did not even deliver my order and did not answer my calls to check the order status. WORST SERVICE EVER and I will strongly recommend that nobody tries this pizza outlet if they really want to eat food.
